metadata.title: CVE-2024-24815 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: (CKEditor4 is an open source what-you-see-is-what-you-get HTML editor. ...)

criterions.comment: ckeditor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
